username_taken: This username has already been taken

avatar_file_upload: Avatar uses a file uploaded on ItsYou.Online
quote_online_presence: Online presence means interaction. Companies need your identity which you present in different ways, depending on the company, person or context.
content_communicate_top: You communicate over various channels and
content_communicate_bottom: in different contexts but it's always you
quote_grinch: “Then the Grinch thought of something he hadn't before! What if Christmas, he thought, doesn't come from a store. What if Christmas... perhaps... means a little bit more!”
quote_communication_identity: An identity when communicating is not about the channel or the provider, it's about who you are talking to in which context.
content_share_bottom: but only as much as you want
quote_share: Don't be afraid to show your face anymore. Share the information you wish to share to a service provider and be sure your other information is safe.
avatar_file_too_large: The file is too large, the maximum upload limit is 100 KB.
existing_qrcode: Your QR code that has been setup for use with an authenticator app.
last_owner: You are the last owner of this organization, so you can't leave it.
new_parent_ownership: This action requires you to have ownership rights on the new parent organization.
new_parent_doesn't_exist: The new parent organization does not exist.
new_name_collision: This organization move would cause a duplicate name.
move_to_child: You can't move organizations to a suborganization of themselves.
